Summary: bright, white light object , reversed direction with incredible ease
divs: Sighting DetailsOn Dec 30th, 1977, at approximately midnight, I and my parents got home from visiting friends and my dad went for an evening stroll. He came back to our home within minutes and told us to go outside with him to view a light in the sky which was making unconventional maneuvers. My mom and I went outside and looked up where he had seen the object and we saw a white, bright object in the sky. The visibility was perfectly clear, and i could see it was definitely not one of the stars in the sky, or a plane, or helicopter. The object was directly above us, at about a 90 degree angle to the horizon, and it appeared to be at a high altitude. It was moving from North to South across the sky but it then reversed direction entirely and took off at a faster speed in the opposite direction. It then reversed direction again and took off again in a Northern direction. The light did not pulsate and it did not give off any glare. We observed it until it moved beyond our visibilty.
